Text: PIRAs Analysis of Sulfur Dioxide Credit Prices Oct PIRA Energy Groups Emissions Marketing Intelligence Service EMIS released its latest report to clients The report entitled SO Credit Prices in a MultiPollutant Post World is the second released this year dealing with SO credit prices This report updates our market analysis for two developments since the release of the earlier report the growing prospect over the course of the past summer of a sharp reduction in the Phase II Clean Air Act emissions cap as part of eventual multipollutant legislation and the political influence on SO credit prices and legislation in a post September th world NonEMIS clients can purchase the report for PIRAs Emissions Market Intelligence Service includes five to eight reports per year analyzing the emissions credit market and public policy for sulfur dioxide nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide global warming The annual fee is for up to users at one site Phone access for quickturnaround research is included For information about PIRAs Emissions Market Intelligence Services EMIS please contact Victoria Watkins at ext or Key sections of SO Credit Prices in a MultiPollutant Post World Summary Credit Prices Emissions Trends and Proposed Caps Emissions Performance in Early Trends in Monthly Fossil FuelFired Generation Fuel Price Developments Politics Before and After September th the Shape of Compromise

PIRAs Analysis of Sulfur Dioxide Credit Prices Oct PIRA Energy Groups Emissions Marketing Intelligence Service EMIS released its latest report to clients The report entitled SO Credit Prices in a MultiPollutant Post World is the second released this year dealing with SO credit prices This report updates our market analysis for two developments since the release of the earlier report the growing prospect over the course of the past summer of a sharp reduction in the Phase II Clean Air Act emissions cap as part of eventual multipollutant legislation and the political influence on SO credit prices and legislation in a post September th world NonEMIS clients can purchase the report for PIRAs Emissions Market Intelligence Service includes five to eight reports per year analyzing the emissions credit market and public policy for sulfur dioxide nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide global warming The annual fee is for up to users at one site Phone access for quickturnaround research is included For information about PIRAs Emissions Market Intelligence Services EMIS please contact Victoria Watkins at ext or Key sections of SO Credit Prices in a MultiPollutant Post World Summary Credit Prices Emissions Trends and Proposed Caps Emissions Performance in Early Trends in Monthly Fossil FuelFired Generation Fuel Price Developments Politics Before and After September th the Shape of Compromise

RE PIRAs Services Description Fees Cc Hi Kevin Thanks for the message PIRA doesnt have any relationships andor agreements with UBS Warburg I know Tim Belden in Portland wants to restore several services Please let me know the number of people licensed users and locations for each retainer service so I can give you a quote for site licensing fees Victoria ext Original Message From mailto Sent Monday January PM To Cc Subject RE PIRAs Services Description Fees Fletch Sturm works for me and runs the MW power group will be following up with you or Allen We need to make sure we coordinate with gas and west power so no duplication is occurring We need to also make sure that UBS is not already a client who receives PIRA materials Original Message From Victoria Watkins ENRON Sent Thursday January AM To Tim Belden Cc Allan Stewart Black Tamara Jae Subject PIRAs Services Description Fees Hi Tim Thank you the phone message about your continued interest in PIRA Energy Group I look forward to hearing from you or Kevin Presto about the PIRA analytical services you want to purchase for your new business Kevin I work for Allan Stewart in PIRAs electricity group and also handle salesmarketing of PIRAs services Attached is a description of PIRAs service offerings and an Excel file showing a price matrix with annual fees Our base retainer service is for up to users at one site office location under a site license agreement One retainer is eg natural gas two retainers are eg electricity and natural gas and three retainers are add oil Fees for additional services such as emissions market intelligence and the daily electricity demand forecast are shown to the right of the main table Clients with users of PIRAs services in multiple offices can arrange a site license for higher usage Best regards Victoria Victoria Watkins PIRA Energy Group Park Ave th Floor New York NY ext Site License MatrixFullxls File Site License MatrixFullxls PIRAPackage Revisedpdf File PIRA UBS Warburg RelationshipPST Hi Fletcher Allan is out of pocket right now otherwise he would contact you He understands youre accustomed to receiving outstanding service from PIRA and we can assure this will continue under a PIRA UBS Warburg relationship Im an analyst in PIRA electricity group and am also responsible for working with prospective clients on licensing PIRAs services and determining annual fees Looking forward to hearing from you Victoria ext Original Message From Victoria Watkins mailto Sent Monday January PM To FletcherJ NRONcom Cc Allan Stewart Subject PIRAs Services Description Fees Hi Fletcher Allan Stewart asked me to contact you Weappreciate yourinterest in PIRA Energy Groups energy analytical services Attached is a description of PIRAs service offerings and an Excel file showing a price matrix with annual fees Our base retainer service is for up to users at one site office location under a site license agreement One retainer is eg natural gas two retainers are eg electricity and natural gas and three retainers are add oil Fees for additional services such as emissions market intelligence and the daily electricity demand forecast are shown to the right of the main table Clients with users of PIRAs services in multiple offices can arrange a site license for higher usage PIRAs clients range from the top natural gas and power marketers to every major gas and oil producer to large financial institutions to energy end users Feel free to call or write about the services My colleagues and I would be delighted to have UBS Warburg as a client Victoria Victoria Watkins PIRA Energy Group Park Ave th Floor New York NY ext Site License MatrixFullxls PIRAPackage Revisedpdf

RE Prior services feesPST Fletch Enron had an enterprisewide agreement for up to users for PIRAs oil gas and electricity retainer services Houston London Calgary and Portland received services The annual fee for these services in is The company also received the following services fees European natural gas retainer London only up to users Daily electricity demand forecast Houston and Portland up to users Emissions market intelligence service Houston up to users Natural gas liquids service Houston up to users There was also a special arrangement between PIRAs electricity group and the electricity trading desk Separate fee Confidential Victoria ext Original Message From Sturm Fletcher J mailtoFletcherJ NRONcom Sent Tuesday January AM To Subject Prior services fees Victoria Sorry I havent been able to contact you by phone but will try today Can you provide me with a list of the services and fee structures in place with Enron Id like to see what we had before so I can compare with what well need going forward Fletch This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
